name: ecole-directe-plus-bot
description: The api and bot for Ecole Directe Plus website

scripts.devA: nodemon --watch api-src --ext js,json --ignore node_modules --exec node api-src/index.js
scripts.devD: nodemon --watch discord_bot-src --ext js,json --ignore node_modules --exec node discord_bot-src/index.js

author: vooxify.public@outlook.fr
